job_description:
VP Sales & Marketing

IatricSystems is seeking a skilled and experienced Vice President, Sales & Marketing to join our Sales & Marketing team. This position is responsible for maximizing revenues through the planning and management of sales and marketing activities. Reporting to this person will be a team of Account Executives, Sales Support Staff and Marketing Professionals. This position will report to the Executive Vice President of iatricSystems.

What Your Impact Will Be

Lead a team of account executives, sales support staff, and marketing professionals.Prepare bookings and operating expense forecasts for our Sales & Marketing department.Work with other department heads to create sales & marketing strategies in alignment with overall business strategy.Evaluate, plan, and attend tradeshows and/or other marketing activities.

What We Are Looking For

10+ years in the Healthcare Technology space5+ years as a people leaderExcellent people & leadership skillsAbility to work quickly and adapt to changing needs & prioritiesAbility to create a sales pipeline forecast and understand financial reports

What We Can Offer

Opportunity for challenging projects and professional growthComprehensive benefit packageLifestyle rewardsFlexible work options

About Us

iatricSystems™, an independent business unit of Harris Healthcare, is a team of Information Technology and Healthcare specialists dedicated to improving the delivery of care through technology. We help healthcare organizations enhance their IT investments. We do so with our diverse healthcare experience, an extensive partner network, and our proven capabilities in privacy & security, EHR optimization, education, and interoperability. For more than 30 years, iatricSystems has delivered solutions to more than 1,300 healthcare organizations and has integrated more than 800 vendor solutions.#J-18808-Ljbffr

Qualifications: 10+ years in the Healthcare Technology space5+ years as a people leader
Ability to work quickly and adapt to changing needs & priorities
Ability to create a sales pipeline forecast and understand financial reports
Responsibilities: This position is responsible for maximizing revenues through the planning and management of sales and marketing activities
Reporting to this person will be a team of Account Executives, Sales Support Staff and Marketing Professionals
This position will report to the Executive Vice President of iatricSystems
Prepare bookings and operating expense forecasts for our Sales & Marketing department
Work with other department heads to create sales & marketing strategies in alignment with overall business strategy.Evaluate, plan, and attend tradeshows and/or other marketing activities
Benefits: Opportunity for challenging projects and professional growth
